title: A Note on the Relation between Different Forms of Superparticle Dynamics'
abstract: A formulation of $D\is 10$ superparticle dynamics is given that contain space-time and twistor variables. The set of constraints is entirely first class, and gauge conditions may be imposed that reduces the system to a Casalbuoni-Brink-Schwarz superparticle, a spinning particle or a twistor particle.
